Author: Chalkos
Name: RepairMe
Description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted. /repairme to config
Punchline: Never forget to repair & extract materia again!
Changelog:
* v1.0.1.9
  * disable in PvP zones
  * hide during mid-fight cutscenes
  * fix position settings in some situations (thanks dlt111 for the help debugging this!)
